summary: Build a modern, premium, mobile-first website for the unisex salon brand “Baidees Salon” with luxury black/gold/white styling, multiple content pages (Home, Services, Gallery, About, Contact/Booking), and conversion-focused features like booking, CTAs, offers, membership, and FAQs.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first, premium minimal aesthetic (luxurious but welcoming) using black/gold/white theme.
Typography pairing: elegant serif for headings, modern sans-serif for body copy.
UI styling: rounded cards, soft shadows, glassmorphism accents.
UX: smooth scroll animations and hover effects; include sticky navigation and footer with social links.
Conversion elements: prominent Book Appointment / Call Now CTAs and WhatsApp booking option.

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-first, multi-page website for the unisex salon brand “Baidees Salon” with these routes/pages: Home, Services, Gallery, About Us, and Contact & Booking. Ensure navigation allows moving between all pages.

Implement the global design system across all pages to match the brand vibe (luxurious but welcoming, stylish, clean, minimal, trustworthy) using a black + gold + white palette, elegant serif headings with modern sans-serif body text, rounded cards, soft shadows, and subtle glassmorphism accents.

Add a sticky navigation bar present on all pages with links to Home, Services, Gallery, About, and Contact/Booking, and include prominent CTAs (Book Appointment, Call Now) where appropriate for conversion.

Build the Home page sections: (1) full-width hero with a stylish salon interior background and tagline “Where Style Meets Confidence”, (2) short intro about Baidees Salon, (3) highlight service cards for Hair Cutting & Styling, Hair Spa & Treatments, Hair Keratin & Smoothening, Beard Grooming, Facial & Skin Care, (4) before/after gallery slider, (5) customer testimonials, (6) CTA buttons: Book Appointment and Call Now.

Build the Services page with categorized service lists and pricing placeholders for: Hair Services (Haircut (Men/Women/Kids), Hair Styling, Hair Coloring, Beard Styling), Hair Treatments (Hair Spa, Keratin Treatment, Smoothening, Rebonding, Anti-Dandruff Treatment, Hair Fall Treatment), Skin & Grooming (Facial, Cleanup, Detan, Head Massage). Each service must include a short benefits description and a duration.

Build the Gallery page with (1) a grid gallery combining hairstyle results and salon interior images, (2) a before/after comparison section, and (3) an Instagram-style layout option (e.g., square tiles and tight grid rhythm).
Build the About Us page including: story of Baidees Salon, professional stylists introduction, hygiene & premium product assurance, and a “Why choose us” bullet list.

Build the Contact & Booking page including: an online appointment booking form (name, phone, service, date, time), a WhatsApp booking button, a Google Maps location placeholder section, and an opening hours section.
Add smooth scroll animations and hover effects throughout the UI (e.g., section reveal, card hover lift, button hover transitions) while keeping performance acceptable on mobile devices.
Add an offer banner feature (e.g., “Flat 20% off on Keratin Treatment”) displayed prominently (at least on Home page, and optionally site-wide).
Add a membership/loyalty card section describing a premium membership (benefits and how it works) with a visually distinct card-style layout consistent with the black/gold/white theme.
Add an FAQ section about treatments and hair care with at least 6 Q&A items, using an accordion interaction pattern suitable for mobile.
Create a site-wide footer with social media links (placeholders acceptable), contact cues, and consistent branding styling.
Add required static image assets for the hero, gallery, before/after examples, and stylist imagery, and render them from frontend static assets (not via backend).
